Text:
Forgot one thing-
It's all in .MKV format, so you would need an MKV player!
What is the source of episodes dvd or hdtv ?
I don't know how you do this or how much time it takes or whatever, but a majority of people would appreciate it being .avi ;)

Crappy collection with broken files and different formats (MKVs with an MP4 thrown in).
Episode 3 looks like a DVD rip, but episode 4 only has 15 minutes and came from French subtitled TV.  Also, there are 2 data packets that apparently nobody has.  (I've been at 99.6% for a couple of days).

Bottomline, don't waste your time.

Stupid me, sorry for the inconvenience, I should mention that Episode 4 has French Subs and Episode 7 may have problems. If you ARE having problems with Episode 7, download it here:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7370339/Falling_Skies_S01E07_(AVI)

----
Also,
Sorry about the 99.6% Error everyone got- that's fixed now due to more seeders.
----
Still, EXTREMELY sorry I didn't know this would happen. And yes, there is one MP4 file in there that I converted, but I put the MP4 instead of the MKV in :/

Im horrible, even if this is my first torrent.
thx for the dld, imma b seeding for about a week after i get it hope to enjoy it as much as your effort to share it ;)
